title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added GitHub Actions workflow to prompt for changelog updates when PRs are merged.
Updated billing documentation: restructured content, added license management guides, and clarified Visual Studio subscription behavior.
Added Dependabot support for vcpkg package manager.
Clarified searchable repository criteria (excludes archived repos).
Updated security-events permission description in Actions docs.
Synced secret scanning data and updated changelog entries.

- Added Dependabot support for vcpkg package manager.
- Clarified searchable repository criteria (excludes archived repos).
- Updated security-events permission description in Actions docs.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added GitHub Actions workflow to prompt for changelog updates when PRs are merged.
- Updated billing documentation: restructured content, added license management guides, and clarified Visual Studio subscription behavior.
- Added Dependabot support for vcpkg package manager.
- Clarified searchable repository criteria (excludes archived repos).
- Updated security-events permission description in Actions docs.
- Synced secret scanning data and updated changelog entries.

### Title
Add changelog prompt workflow, update billing docs, and support vcpkg in Dependabot
